Quote.Speaker: Description
Quote.Text: [Pam is on phone and clicking her mouse rhythmically, Jim is clicking his pen equally as much, and Dwight notices]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Stop it!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Stop what?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're talking about me in Morse Code. Well, you know what? Joke's on you 'cause I know Morse Code. Ha!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [chuckles] Yeah. That's what we're doing. In our very limited free time and with our very limited budget, we went and got a nanny and then we went out and took a class on a very outmoded and very unnecessary form of communication just so we could talk about you in front of you.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yup. That's exactly what we did.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It all started when Dwight was tapping his foot against the leg of his desk. When I asked him to stop, he said, "I will when you lose the baby weight."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Very well. I must have imagined it. I apologize. [Pam clacking her stapler and Jim responding with tapping his keyboard rhythmically] Detonator. Detonator where? Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jim. Are you clicking a detonator?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's a pen.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Michael, come on.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Get back to work, Dwight. Please.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Fine. [clears throat] Hey. Tap away. [Dwight puts noise-cancelling headphones on and Pam and Jim begin to blink rhythmically]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ooh! Things with Donna are so... oh-ho-ho! They're going great. I, uh... we're just clicking on every level. Emotionally and sexually and... orally and I am not used to relationships going this well. I'm actually having trouble focusing on my job. And I like it!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who enjoys the weekends? [all raise hands] Of course. Now the weekend is always great if you have someone, which I do. I have Donna. She is hot. She has a Pilates butt. But we need to find something to do this weekend beside have sex. Did I say that? Yes, I did. [all nod] And the reason you are here is that I need ideas for things that Donna and I could do on the weekend. So just shout it out.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I have an idea for your weekend.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Let me get back to my desk right now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, you get out of here, big dog. [high-fives Stanley] Ah, no, no, no, no. You guys sit down. I need ideas.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Stanley got to go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, well, Stanley doesn't help with anything. Come on. Shout 'em out, shout 'em out.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Walk around apple orchards.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Super romantic.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's fun.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Eel fishing.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Curl up with your favorite DVD.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: You and Donna should hit the Poconos. They have heart-shaped Jacuzzis. Room enough for three.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We actually went to the Poconos last Tuesday. We headed up there, we went to a little Chinese bistro, um, P.F. Chang's.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Wait, why would you go all the way to the Poconos to P.F. Chang's when we have the Great Wall in Scranton.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Because when your super-hot girlfriend says, "I wanna go to Mount Pocono," you go to Mount Pocono and you do her. And we screwed. Whoops. TMI.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Wait, that's crazy far. Are you sure she's not cheating?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what, Kelly? This is the real world. Not The Real World:

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Does she leave the room when she takes phone calls? Does she keep perfume in her purse? Does she shower before sex? Does she shower after sex? Does she...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, she does all that.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Sorry, dude.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, do not let your imagination run amok.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Run what?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Amok. It means, don't let your imagination run out of control.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why didn't you just say that, Pam?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, do not let your imagination run out of control.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, that's easy for you to say. You have a bad imagination. It's stupid. I live in a fantasy world.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You do?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, Jim, I do. And I can't stay in a relationship that is full of lies and deceit.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: But you didn't believe any of this was true five minutes ago.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's what makes it so wrong.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ever since I found out that Donna might be cheating on me, I have not eaten or slept. This not knowing, that's what's killing me.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, God, that tickles. What did...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [whispers] I want someone to follow Donna. I want her tailed. I need the name of a good private investigator.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I think I've got one for you. [hands Michael a business card]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is you. How much do you charge?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: $100 a day, plus expenses.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'll give you $50. Money's no object.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm just gonna warn you... and I say this to all my clients... you might not like what I find.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And you might not like how I find it. [slides over table, leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Of course. Yeah, that's terrible. Okay, let me get back to you. Hey, Stanley. One of my clients just called and said that their Sabre printer started smoking and caught on fire.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: My doctor told me to cut out hot dogs. We all got problems.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey, Gabe I need to talk to you about something. It's really important.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: There's no way that you guys have any almond butter, right?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, I don't know. Look, one of my clients called. He was in the middle of a big printing job and the back of the printer started smoking and then the paper tray caught on fire.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: That's weird. I haven't heard of that happening. I would even settle for apricot preserves.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What are we gonna do about this?

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I don't know. Call HQ, see if they know anything. Yeah. That's what I'll do today. All right. Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Let me know what they say.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [puts newspaper down] Wow. That dude is good.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What do you mean?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You didn't feel like he was hiding something?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Like he was... covering something up? Maybe.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Two years ago, Andy blamed the warehouse for a late shipment that he forgot to process. We got yelled at pretty bad. Almost lost my job, and I was mad as hell at the time. But I said "Darryl, just wait. He's a fool. There's gonna be an opportunity. Just be patient." [smiles]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [sitting on his Firebird's hood in front of a gym] Hi stranger.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Oh, hi. You work for Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I work with Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Right.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Dwight Schrute. [they shake hands]

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Donna, hi.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: All cases are solved with logic. The only logical way to find out if Donna Is a cheater is to seduce her, bring her to orgasm, then call Michael and tell him the sad news.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's interesting. Wow, it's a little early for ice cream, don't you think?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's never too early for ice cream, Jim. But we didn't have any ice cream, so this is mayonnaise and black olives.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, my God

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's comfort food, all right? [disgustedly] God.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You know Michael, this whole Donna thing is gonna be okay, you just... stop beating yourself up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I know. Well, I hope you're right. We'll see what Dwight says.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Why do we have to see what Dwight says?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Because I have him investigating her. I'm waiting for a text update.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Michael, no...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, no, no, no. Undo that. Undo that.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's too late to undo it. I need to know. Otherwise this thing is going to spiral out of amok.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael. Okay, I'm... I'm going to talk straight to you because I think you need to hear it. Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: God, this is so disgusting.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Stop eating it! Do you wanna be happy? Look at you. You have a major self-destructive streak in you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I know.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: And you kind of torpedo every romantic relationship you're in.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's not true. [Pam stares him down] You're right, I ruin everything. And I've known some wonderful women. Holly, Carol, Jan.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Helene.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Helene?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: My mother.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: My mother, Helene. [Jim shakes his head]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah. Yes, yes. Yes. All of, all of the greatest loves of my life.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You should stop this, [pulls away mayo and olives bowl] and you should call Dwight right now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sighs] All right. [calls Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [at gym, looks ready to work out, checks phone, and tries to grab Donna's attention] Oh, gosh, we were both going for the same weight at the same time; you go ahead.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It's all yours. [strains loudly to lift two dumbbells and a free weight chained to strap around his head] Ah! [after first rep, Dwight is injured]

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: You okay?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, I'm good. Hey, you know an exercise for two people that uses the whole body?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: [chuckles] Yeah, I think I know what you're talking about.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Tractor pulling. Too bad there's not a tractor here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [moaning loudly on exercise machine while staring at Donna who's next to him] Oh. Oh. Oh. [groans loudly] One thing you need to know about me. I don't quit until something tears or pops. [chuckles] You look like you're getting a good workout. Can I feel your pulse?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Nope. I'm good, thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Really? Hey, um... [Dwight gets up and walks sorely from his "workout"]

Quote.Speaker: Old lady
Quote.Text: Look, young man, can you wipe down that seat?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Get out of my way. Huh!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Tomorrow's fertilizer, am I right?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: I'm out of here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Donna. Donna, wait, please. I'm sorry. Okay? Listen. We both know why I'm here:

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're back. What happened?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, I pulled muscles in both my thighs. Thanks for asking.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, what happened with Donna?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, no. She's not cheating. Oh, man! Will you help me work out this knot? Right here. [near his groin]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ugh!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Put your fingers here.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. No! Are you sure?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm positive. Yeah, oh, and here's your expense receipts right there.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who eats eight protein bars?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: People who don't trust egg whites.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. Well, I am just glad this is all over.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, me too. And by the way, uh, I told her not to, but she's coming over here and she's furious.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What? No, she didn't say that.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're right. I was paraphrasing. What she actually said was, [pulls out notebook] "What is with him? He is crazy. I'm coming over there to talk to him." And this was after I have no other recourse but to tell her and gym security that you had me sent there to see if she was cheating. Also, I joined the gym. You'll be billed monthly. [lays down gym membership receipt on a chair in Michael's office.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am not paying for that membership.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sitting on the floor behind Erin's desk, sighs] Ohhh... mmm...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Maybe you'd be more comfortable in your own office.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, I like the attention. Is she here yet?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Uh, no. [Michael sighs, Donna enters] Wait, yes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's her?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mm-hmm. Right. Right. Right. [Michael pretends to be speaking on the phone as Donna approaches] Okay, I'll talk to you later.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: How could you think I would cheat on you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I didn't. Everybody else here did. Everybody convinced me that something was up. They poisoned my mind.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: That's pathetic.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ye... pfff. Well, no. It's a lie. That's not what happened. I just like you. I can't believe I get to be with you. You work at an adult arcade. You could have any man you want.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: When I tell you I like you, you need to trust me, not some freak. [Dwight is gulping some sort of power shake]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: If you wanna dump me, I totally get it.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: I told you I like you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, you are boner-ific. [Donna laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Hey, if I said that we should go away for a couple of days, you would...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: ...poop my pants.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Have you ever been to Vero Beach?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, my God, Vero Beach. No. Is that on the water?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: We're going.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We are?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What's up? I got your e-mail.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Close the door.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I don't have a plan exactly. More of a loose structure. Gives me freedom to improvise. It's like jazz. [scatting] Andy don't mess with me. [continues scatting] I'll figure something out.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Some freaky stuff going on. I was walking behind Gabe and I heard some things.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Such as?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It was kind of mumbled, I don't know, uh, only thing I could make out clearly was "Andy," "Problem," "Eliminate," something. I don't know what it meant.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What? You don't know what it meant? How about "Andy is a problem and we must eliminate him?"

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Whoa. I hadn't even thought of that.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [chuckles nervously] Yeah. Hah. Hoo.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh, hey, I love your earrings.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Did Michael get them for you?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: No, I bought them myself.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Where?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Steamtown Mall.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Claire's? Zales? Ricky's? Earring, Earrings? Fancy Girl? Platinum Cat? Where?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: You know, I actually got them in Philadelphia, in a mall down there.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Franklin Mills? King of Prussia? Springfield? Governor's Place?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Uh, Franklin Mills.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [to Pam] What?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hmm? Oh. It's probably nothing.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, heart-shaped jewelry is not something that a woman buys for herself. A man definitely bought it for her recently, and it wasn't Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wait, so are you... you like heart-shaped jewelry, though, right?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No. Except for the pendant that you bought me. Which I love.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Psst... [Creed walks by Andy and draws his right index finger across his neck, further scaring Andy, Andy looks over at Darryl who is staring him down]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Creed's head of quality assurance. So he'd definitely be wrapped up in this.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: So there I am, minding my own business and Darnell offers me three bucks. All I gotta do is walk by Andy and go like this. [draws finger across neck] Darnell's a chump. I would have done it for anything. I've done a lot more for a lot less.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So it turns out Donna and I have a facebook friend of a friend in common, so I was able to see some of her pictures online. [pulls out picture of Donna embracing a man and smiling] This was taken two weeks ago. And this was taken the same night. [pulls out a picture of Donna kissing the same man] This photo was taken this morning. [shows a baby picture] It's Cece. [laughs] She's never gonna do anything wrong.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Isn't that something?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Wow. [Pam knocks on Michaels door and goes in] That's exciting.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'm sorry to interrupt you. Um, I actually have something very important to talk to you about, business related.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well it can wait. It can wait.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I lied it's personal. It's about me and Jim. We're... I just... you're the only person I can talk to.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jim is her husband.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: And...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And they are having problems, so sh...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, not... we're not... we're not having problems. But it is personal. And I would love...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Good in bed.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes. Yes, I desperately want to speak with you about my sex life with Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, my God. Look at how cheap street level rooms are. Am I the only person who enjoys people watching?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [loudly] I need you to sign this! So bad!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, weirdo.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I love [leans over Michael's desk to look at his computer screen]... this idea is neat. I've never been. It sounds lovely. [meanwhile Michael looks at the pictures Pam printed out]

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Yeah I think it'll be a nice trip. We're gonna get a lot done.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [to Michael] You're gonna wanna look at the date on that. Oh, wow. Look at... golfing. [to Donna] Are you a golfer?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: I am, but I, I gave my clubs away. I swear too much. [Pam and Donna both laugh] Hey, you okay? [to Michael, walking away disappointedly]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, I just remembered that I have to go to the bathroom. Pam?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Absolutely. [both leave Michael's office]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Look, I'm not down there anymore, so if the guys start making fun of you, you just, you gotta stand up for yourself.

Quote.Speaker: Glen
Quote.Text: I know, it's just, I'm scared...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Your text said 911.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Glen, could you excuse us? [Andy slams the door after Glen leaves, panting heavily]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's bad.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What's bad?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's real bad.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Still no plan.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, God.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's getting bigger.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I might have to go public here, but no one's gonna believe me. Uh... I need proof. I need, like, a printer to catch on fire.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I can videotape it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [to camera] There it is.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: There what is?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who the hell is this? Who is this guy?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I don't know who he is.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: God! Lowest of the low. That guy. Just a notch above Toby. You know what?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm gonna kill him. No, I'm not. I feel... I... no, I'm not going to kill him.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You just have to go in there. You have to hear it from her.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have to hear it from her.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You have to settle down first.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I need to have her tell me herself. Right?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay. Okay. Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I need to have her say...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, but you have to calm...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I need to say, "What the hell is that? What the hell is that?"

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay. Look at this, look at this. Baby picture.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, God! No, no, oh, my God!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [in baby voice] Hi, Michael, hi, Michael

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [calms down] Okay. Okay. Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [to Andy] I talked to corporate. Turns out there have been 12 reports of faulty printers. Out of 400,000. [smiles] We've investigated. Every time it's been user error. They block the vents or something, I don't know. That's why we have the fine print. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. So I'd like to reward you for that. [pulls out gift card] That's god for five bucks at Dunkin' Donuts. Any Dunkin' Donuts. [Andy looks over at Darryl and Darryl motions for Andy to go to him]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what? We should really do something fun this week.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Yeah, we should.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Wouldn't that be fun?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How about Thursday?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Thursday works. Yeah, what do you wanna do?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I can't do Thursday. Book club. How about Friday?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Oh, Friday doesn't work.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, really? 'cause I was thinking we could go to this concert. Spice Girls are opening for Weird Al. Front row. It'd be a great, great concert.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Shoot. I'm working.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh okay. Well, maybe I could stop by.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Well, won't you be at the concert?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Nope, that's Tuesday.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Oh, well, I can make it on Tuesday.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're cheating. You're cheating on me.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: How do you know?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam told me. [looks up at 2nd floor windows and so does Donna; Jim, Dwight, and Pam are visible on conference room window, they all scramble as soon as Donna and Michael look up, Pam throwing herself on the floor]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [gasps] Did she see me?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [to Pam on floor] Nice effort.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [in old Michael Scott Paper Company's "office"] We're printing on 24-pound premium stock paper, approximately 300 sheets in. So far, no signs of distress. [Darryl is filming Andy's demonstration]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You haven't even introduced yourself.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Right. My name is Andrew Baines Bernard, and if you're watching this, it's because I've turned State's witness because I'm in danger because I know too much.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You should talk in a higher voice 'cause the camera makes you sound weird.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Higher? Okay. [speaking slightly higher] Recently certain events have come to my attention...

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Higher. [motions with hand to go up more]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Make it higher? Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Mm-hmm

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [high-pitched] I have come to the conclusion that the Sabre corporation...

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: One more, yeah. [Again motions to go even higher]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [higher] May be overlooking certain safety regulations. At the danger... [printer starts smoking and explodes] ah! [speaking lower] It's working. [in normal voice] It's... I knew it!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: This... [removes camera headset]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We are blowin' the roof off! Blowin' the roof off! [Darryl discharges fire extinguisher onto printer] Nice. Nice. This is my partner, Darryl Philbin. He's been my partner through this entire thing.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I don't wanna prank anymore. Things get real. It's not funny. I'm just gonna be good, stay in my room, go to church, try to do one nice thing per day. I do not wanna prank anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who is he?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: What, what do you mean?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: The other man. Who's the guy? Who is it?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: It's you. I'm married.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm the mistress?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [on workout bicycle at gym] Okay, everybody, let's take this next hill.

Quote.Speaker: Gym Instructor
Quote.Text: Excuse me. Yeah, I'd appreciate it if you'd just let me run this.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You know what? You had your chance. You're no leader. Out of your seat, let's blast!

Quote.Speaker: Gym instructor
Quote.Text: Don't listen to him, we're approaching a cooldown down a gentle hill.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No! The hill's a trap. Let's take the dirt road off to the side.

Quote.Speaker: Gym instructor
Quote.Text: No, guys, no. We're just cooling down...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: If they catch us, they will rape us. Go for the cliff. And three, two, one... jump! No! [points to those around him] You're dead, you're dead, you're dead. Good jump. You're barely alive. Okay, now nice cooldown. Check your pulse rate.

Quote.Speaker: Description
Quote.Text: In memory of Larry Einhorn.
